item.title: Introduction to R
item.description: Introduzione Reading time: 1 minute(s) @ 200 WPM. So, this post should not be here. Itâ€™s marked as a draft in RStudio, and Hugo should not build it. But it seems that including it is the only way to get all the other files of this website to be in sync, so here it is. Readers may follow it as it develops. I hope you can stand the excitement.
